hymn.title: O Lord of life, breathe on us now
hymn.category: Fulness of the Spirit—As the Breath

layout.singingstanza: O Lord of life, breathe on us now. And move with -- in us while we pray: The spring of our new life art Thou, The ve -- ry light of our new day.

hymn.copyright: Used and altered by permission of Mrs. Alice Tempest.

lyrics.stanza: O Lord of life, breathe on us now. And move within us while we pray: The spring of our new life art Thou, The very light of our new day.
O strangely art Thou with us, Lord, Neither in height nor depth to seek; In nearness shall Thy voice be heard: Spirit to spirit Thou dost speak.
Thou art our Advocate on high: He is our Advocate within; O plead the truth, and make reply To every argument of sin.
But ah, this faithless heart of mine! The way I know, I know my guide; Forgive me, O my Friend divine, That I so often turn aside.
Be with me when no other friend The myst'ry of my heart can share: And be Thou known, when fears transcend. By Thy best name of Comforter.
